about_the_game:
For video creators and streamers
KIMIDORI SOFT permits monetization through partner programs using KIMIDORI SOFT games.

Who doesn't love yakiniku?

How much can you eat at the BBQ restaurant? How many days can you survive at the BBQ restaurant? How far can your stomach endure? Who grilled this meat anyway? Food waste is a no-go.

Stealing, being stolen from, sometimes giving, and the budding friendships... all with a tear in your eye.

Welcome to Yakiniku Party Survival.

Game Overview:
Survive by consuming a balanced mix of protein, carbohydrates, and fats.
Each ingredient affects your nutritional balance differently.
If you overeat and your calories go overboard, you won’t be able to eat anymore. Burn off those calories with squats!

Game Features:
Online Multiplayer: Play with up to 4 people. Both Quick Matches and Friend Matches are available, and you can freely enter or leave either. In Quick Matches, survivors from around the world play at their own pace. Friend Matches let you easily play with specific friends using a single keyword. Of course, you can also play solo.

Cooperative or Competitive Play: In online multiplayer, you can grill meat for other players or steal their meat instead.

Skills: Learn and upgrade survival skills, such as tableware, rice, stomach expansion, or squat efficiency.

Fever Event: During The Fever event, no matter how much you consume, it’s zero calories! It’s your chance to balance your nutrition in one go.

name: Yakiniku Party Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This is a game where you challenge yourself to survive using only the ingredients from a yakiniku restaurant. Survive by maintaining a balanced diet and eat as much as you can. If your stomach gets full, burn off calories with squats to get hungry again!
